message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand it might be worth $12000 to you. Considering the exceptional quality and unique features of this product, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $14000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive price. I look forward to hearing your response.
